data.text:
It was an amazing stay at Kouros! The whole crew was so nice to everyone and always in a good mood. The rooms are very spacious and have good beds and bathroom. The swimmingpool is a bit cold if you ask me, but that’s subjective. 
The food is also very good, two different menu’s, one at the pool bar and one at their own restaurant. Maybe a good comment would be to add a bit more vegetarian options for the main course.
We also took a very good massage at their boutique spa. Yiannis did a very good job and knew exactly what he did.
Maybe till next time!
data.title: A great stay!

data.text: We could not fault the hotel. It’s very quirky and modern, congratulations to whoever the architect was. There are many relaxing areas, deep padded sunbeds, and you can use both pools at Kouros Exclusive, and Home and Suites. We had a room with our own private pool. It was modern and spacious, the beds were so comfortable, and it was a lovely touch having a chocolate left on your pillow each night. The staff on reception and the cleaners were lovely and always wore a smile to work. We ate at the snack bar, which we thoroughly enjoyed, however we thought Terra Med was very overpriced for what it was and were disappointed with our meal and the service . This comes from a couple who are used to London prices. That said, young George did his best to put things  right. One of the benefits of Kouros is that a number of supermarkets are 1-2 minutes walk away and you’re only about 3 minutes from Anthony Quinn Bay where there are loads of beach side tavernas. We loved the traditional Greek food in them.  We were lucky to have car hire so saw most of the island and also took a boat to Symi Island which was absolutely stunning. The breakfast was amazing, loads of choice and we especially loved the home made granola.
data.title: A Very Relaxing Hot Week!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Doris,
Thank you for choosing our hotel and for taking the time to share your review with us. We're glad that you ha a wonderful stay and you enjoyed our facilities. We look forward to welcoming you in the near future.
Kind regards,
Kouros Exclusive Hotel
owner_response.author: Kouros Exclusive

data.text: We stayed for 10 days and the hotel was really amazing. Great food in the restaurant and the snack bar. Staff were extremely friendly and helpful. Big mention to George at reception who really gave us the full hotel experience. The rooms in the hotel are beautiful and modern. Over all , the whole experience was brilliant and we will definitely be returning.
data.title: Amazing stay

owner_response.title: Owner response

Kind regards,
Kouros Exclusive Hotel
owner_response.author: Kouros Exclusive

data.text:
We had a great stay at this hotel. The room was gorgeous and clean, though not completely finished since we were staying in the new wing. The bathtub was not finished, but we weren't going to use this anyway, since the shower was perfect. 
We had a private swimmingpool on our balcony which was great. 
The staff is very helpful. I would 10/10 recommend to book a massage with Yiannis if you have the time (or 2 or 3..) best massage I ever had. 
The food in the restaurant is really good, both a la carte menu and sushi. Breakfast is really complete. Probably one of the best hotels I ever stayed at. We might be back ;)
data.title: Excellent!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:

Thank you for choosing our hotel and for taking the time to share a review with us! We're glad that you had a wonderful stay at our hotel. We look forward to welcoming you again in the near future.
Kind regards,
Kouros Exclusive Hotel
owner_response.author: Kouros Exclusive

data.text: As we were in Lindos we paid a visit to Kouros Exclusive as we have stayed there on 3 occasions previously. The extended renovations are amazing over 20 swim up pool rooms and 3 main pools. The lunch was divine...my friend had smashed burger and I had chicken gyros...absolutely delicious. Cocktails & Mocktails were fabulous. The sun loungers are varied and so comfortable. In the evening we ate sushi at Terra Med the Japanese salad was too die for. The owners are very hospitable and staff professional and welcoming. We are planning our 4th visit for next year!
data.title: Amazing!

owner_response.title: Owner response

Kind regards,
Kouros Exclusive Hotel
